Bakery Products

Breads, Rolls, Bagels, Biscuits and Muffins
  • Food
  • Bakery Products

As an innovator in starch and protein solution technologies, MGP combines decades of experience with unrivaled technical expertise to support your bakery product initiatives. Our highly functional specialty starches and proteins have applications across a wide spectrum of bakery product formulations.

Breads, Rolls, Bagels, Biscuits and Muffins

Ingredient Benefits: Reduces Mix Time, Enhances Dietary Fiber, Increases Finished Product Volume, Improves Product Release, Increases Dough Strength and Texture

  • Optein
  • Fibersym® RW
  • Arise® 5000
  • Arise® 6000
  • Arise® 8000
  • Pregel™ 40
  • Pregel™ 46
  • Pregel™ 10
  • Midsol™ 1
  • HWG 2009™
